Group hierarchy: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
Since the DB servers were the highest cost
Region: I made them a bit smaller
Description: but added the SSD option to increase drive read/write speed which will hopefully offset the reduction in memory and CPU.  If the developers decided they didn't need to use SQL
Service: then other options could be explored including using RDS instead of an EC2 instance with SQL server.
